task.title: Activate a Product on Steam
task.shortdesc: Steam games that are bought from a third party seperate from the Steam Store must be manually activated using a code.

context.p: Activateable Steam games bought at a physical storefront will often have a code inside the box. Online third party sellers usually email you the code soon after purchase.

step.cmd: From the Library page, click Add a Game at the bottom left.
Click Activate a Product on Steam.
Input the product code you received from the third party seller.
